answers.answer: I had gestational diabetes with my last pregnancy. They sent me home with a book of meal plans (great selections) a meter and strips and a log chart. I had to check my blood before eating in the morning, and then every 4 hours after that. I had to record all of my logs down. Hope things get better! Good luck hun!

I have GD right now.  I take my blood sugar at 4 times a day and I take insulin at bed timethat's only because my fasting sugar is high. The diet isn't that bad chicken fish meat will be your best friend also veggies and fruits in moderation it's really not that bad.  salads eggs are great also. you'll notice by the end of your pregnancy if you haven't lost some weight then you'll just feel so great.

I have it now also. I take insulin 4 times a day. I watch what I eat and eat in small portions. Im 5 months and haven't really gained weight but baby is growing good. It's not a bad thing because it will change your eating habits for the future. Good luck to you.

Why are you having blood drawn twice a week???  I have gd and I only test once a day now because my levels are fine. I think I failed the test because I had a soft drink the night before since no one told me to fast. Idrink crystal light lemonade daily and no pop and eat what I usually did and my levels are just fine.
